channel.title: My Life Cookbook on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in My Life Cookbook on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Potatoes, Peppers, and Kielbasa Skillet
item.description: Source: My Life Cookbook Ingredients 3 Tablespoons olive oil 3 potatoes chopped 2 sweet bell peppers chopped 1 onion chopped 14 oz kielbasa sliced 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/4 teaspoon oregano 1/4 basil 1 teaspoon crushed garlic Directions Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Using 1 Tablespoon of olive oil, spread all over a cast iron or oven proof skillet. In a large bowl add your vegetables and kielbasa.
